lead_paragraph: The woman and her baby were in the car, whose tailpipe was blocked by snow, as her husband worked to shovel it out in Passaic, N.J. Her daughter, 3, was also in the car and was in critical condition.

headline.print_headline: Car Exhaust Kills Mother and Infant
headline.main: Mother and Son, 1, Die of Carbon Monoxide Poisoning in Car During Snowstorm

snippet: The woman and her baby were in the car, whose tailpipe was blocked by snow, as her husband worked to shovel it out in Passaic, N.J. Her daughter, 3, was also in the car and was in critical condition.
abstract: Woman and 1-year-old son die in Passaic, NJ, of carbon monoxide poisoning while sitting inside parked car with engine running while women's husband shoveled car out after snow storm; poisoning, which also left 3-year-old daughter in critical condition, is due to fact that car's exhaust pipe was buried in snow.
